DOC.brief_summary: This proposal develop collaboration University Minnesota New American Community Services ( NACS ) , research design base needs assessment conduct community partner . The investigator test hypothesis woman offer home vaginal bio-specimen collection high rate cervical cancer screen completion woman refer clinic-based Pap test . All participant give identical education material cervical cancer screen HPV , currently use Minnesota Sage Program .
DOC.brief_title: Cervical Cancer Screening Project Part C
DOC.detailed_description: The trial pilot text protocol home vaginal bio-specimen collection human papillomavirus ( HPV ) test cervical cancer screening . The main objective estimate successful screen completion rate among sample Somali woman undergone cervical cancer screen three year . Women randomize either home vaginal bio-specimen collection referral undergo clinic-based Pap test .
DOC.criteria: Somali female age 2570 year live U.S. 10 year less Pap test ( self report ) last 3 year Women self report past history follow eligible : total hysterectomy cervical cancer active history cervical dysplasia
